titleStmt.title: Musgrave muzled: or The traducer gagg'd. Being a just vindication of the Right Honourable Sr. Arthur Haslerigg, and all other persons herein concerned. From the scandalous imputations, and forged articles exhibited by John Musgrave.
titleStmt.author: Hesilrige, Arthur, Sir, d. 1661.
England and Wales. Council of State. Saterday [sic] the 25. of January, 1650. At the Councell of State at White-hall.

notesStmt.note: Relates legal action brought by Sir Arthur Hesilrige before Council of State against John Musgrave for condemnation of his administration of the northern counties in "True and exact relation of the great and heavy pressures and grievances the well-affected of the northern bordering counties lye under". Also relates consequent proceedings of the Council of State which found in favour of Sir Arthur Hesilrige.
Suggested name of printer from internal evidence.
P. 21-22 contain proceedings of Council of State.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
